Another movie worth mentioning is "The Dead Zone," a suspenseful thriller about a man who awakens from a coma with psychic abilities, including the ability to see people's futures. Christopher Walken and Anthony Zerbe star in this critically acclaimed film that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

These films offer thought-provoking narratives about the human experience during and after war, making them great choices for exploring your interest in stories about animators and war.
